page.title: 10Children's Crazes.
page.content: Crazes usually do not last long e.g. Skateboarding was really popular a few years ago but now it is rarely seen. About a year ago many people became interested in BMX (bicycle motor cross).These are special strong cycles for tricks and stunts. A BMX track has been built on a field in Rawcliffe and lots of children especially boys have BMX bikes. Roller boots are popular with girls mostly they skate about the streets on them and Roller Discos were popular once but not so much now Another new activity is break-dancing There is a place in York where you can learn how to break-dance. Break dancing means moving and spinning on the floor using hands and body. Body- popping is another dance craze where the dancer moves like a robot.
